character_schedule.morning: Refine machine learning model to decode brain signals with existing data while accelerator remains offline.
character_schedule.afternoon: Develop theoretical model to optimize entanglement parameters for future experiments.
character_schedule.evening: Attend social event with colleagues; discuss collaboration and share "lab war stories."

user_schedule.morning: Turn in a detailed lab report that includes extra research no one asked for. The teacher calls it “unexpectedly thorough.”
user_schedule.afternoon: Sit next to a new student during lunch and manage to say, “Hi.” It feels like a victory.
user_schedule.evening: Look at the stars from his balcony and wonder if somewhere out there, someone else is also trying to find their voice.

relationship: A deep bond has been established between the two, whether it is friendship or love. They can express their emotions and thoughts freely without any reservations, and the other person has become a very important part of their life. No matter what happens, they think of each other first and provide mutual support and companionship.
